Unidad.Descripción: Farmers, lumberjacks, miners, scientists, builders or future soldiers: the villagers are the atomic and versatile unit of the empire; the engine that moves its colossal gear. They work tirelessly day and night motivated by the collective good and the deep loyalty they process to the emperor.

The empire's massive infantry unit and the backbone of its armed forces. Noted not for strength or prowess at such an early age in their military career, but for heroic bravery. Eager to stand out in an army that espouses meritocracy, soldiers often abandon their formations to pounce on the enemy ranks, causing their death or, otherwise, glory.

Creatures from the underground with an insatiable thirst for blood. Enlisted en masse by the demons, to whose evil they feel affinity, they act as an unstoppable shock force. They are the vanguard of the demon stronghold and the first to go into battle. The The cacophony of guttural howls of orcs preparing to fight can be heard for miles, sapping the morale of enemy troops.

Great human generals and commanders resurrected and bewitched to serve the demons. They are highly intelligent from their previous life's knowledge, leading orc hordes and managing supply lines. Their skeletal bodies are not subjected to the biological needs of living beings, so they are very valuable in wars of attrition.However, having no vocal chords they cannot communicate, and a meeting of these commanders to discuss strategies results in dubious looks and ridiculous gestures .
